pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyhclrsPython wrapper for [martinohmann/hcl-rs](https://github.com/martinohmann/hcl-rs).## Setup```shpip install pyhclrs```## Usage```py>>> import pyhclrs>>> pyhclrs.loads("""variable "docker_ports" {... type = list(object({... internal = number... external = number... protocol = string... }))... default = [... {... internal = 8300... external = 8300... protocol = "tcp"... }... ]... }"""){'variable': {'docker_ports': {'type': '${list(object({ internal = number, external = number, protocol = string }))}', 'default': [{'internal': 8300, 'external': 8300, 'protocol': 'tcp'}]}}}```
